tags: Value for money,
review:
I recently had the pleasure of visiting Dr. Parzan for a routine check-up, and I am incredibly impressed with the level of care I received. From the moment I stepped into the clinic, I felt welcomed and at ease. Dr. Parzan has a warm and approachable demeanor that immediately put me at ease.

Despite being a male gynaecologist, Dr. Parzan demonstrated a deep understanding and sensitivity towards women's health issues. He took the time to listen to my concerns, answered all my questions thoroughly, and explained every step of the examination process with great care. His professionalism and expertise were evident throughout the appointment.

The clinic itself is clean, modern, and well-equipped, further adding to the comfort of the visit. The staff were friendly and efficient, making the entire experience smooth and stress-free.

I highly recommend Dr. Parzan to any woman seeking a compassionate, knowledgeable, and respectful gynaecologist. He is an excellent healthcare provider who truly cares about his patients' well-being

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,IUI - intrauterine insemination,Cesarean Delivery,
review:
We are so thankful to the almighty to have you as our gynaec and the way you have guided us in the entire pregnancy. We came to you in August 2023 and you explained everything so smoothly and gave confidence that everything can be managed.Within a span of fortnight there was conception like a miracle.Somehow as a couple we had so much trust upon you that we followed you without any second thought. You have given us the most precious gift to us for which we were waiting for like anything. From day 1 to delivery the journey was so smooth. We are blessed with a cute baby boy and I am sure whosoever will visit to you will be blessed as well.We are truly beholders to you.Thank you 😊
Shantanu & Prajakta

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I recently visited Dr. Parizan at the Gynafem Clinic for a routine check-up. This was my first visit to her office, and I was very impressed.

Scheduling the Appointment:
The process of scheduling an appointment was straightforward and convenient. The office staff were courteous and managed to fit me in within a week of my call.

Office Environment and Staff:
Upon arrival, the waiting time was minimal—about 10 to 20 minutes, which is quite reasonable. The office was clean and welcoming, and the receptionist was very friendly and professional.

Consultation:
Dr. Parizan has an excellent bedside manner. he greeted me warmly and made me feel comfortable right away. he took the time to listen to all my concerns without rushing through the appointment. Dr. Parizan explained my health condition and the treatment options in a clear and concise manner, which made it easy for me to understand. he was thorough in her examination and answered all my questions patiently.

Outcome:
I left the office feeling well-informed and confident in the treatment plan he provided. Dr. Parizan also scheduled a follow-up appointment to monitor my progress, which shows him commitment to patients' well-being.

Conclusion:
Overall, my experience with Dr. Parizan was outstanding. he is a ************** caring, and attentive gynecologist. I would highly recommend Dr. Parizan to anyone looking for a reliable and compassionate doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had the privilidge to meet Dr parzan for my issue.He was quite thorough in explaining the issue/cause/treatment and thereby helped me go through accurate procedures and test and guided me with further treatment options.
He is well versed with new advanced medicines/treatments.
He is also super responsive with any query/concerns you may have and answers them with patience.
I would highly recommend him.
Thank you doc!!!

review:
I was very nervous and skeptical to go ahead with the  treatment but Dr Parzan made me feel so much at ease and explained the procedure to me in detail as well as patiently answered all my questions and queries.
During this time you need a doctor who is approachable, who keeps you at ease and gives you the positivity that everything is going to be great and that’s what Dr Parzan did … 
If you are thinking twice and nervous like me, Dr. Parzan is your solution . Trust me you won’t be disappointed…

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We have been consulting with Dr. Parzan Mistry since Day 1 of Pregnancy. He is one of the most reliable and professional doctors always inducing confidence in his patients. The medical care provided by Dr. Parzan is of the highest level and the ease at which he keeps his patients is commendable.

Be it the medical diagnosis, check ups and tests - he makes sure everything is taken care of promptly and recommends best course of action to be taken after feasible explanation to the patient(s).

My wife and I, we highly recommend Dr. Parzan Mistry as your go to gynaecologist and consulting obstetrician.

We are so grateful to Dr. Parzan Mistry. We've been through this journey for 3years and at some point I almost lost hope! Dr. Parzan went above beyond for us .He is very professional , ************** caring I trusted him in all aspects. I would have not asked for better doctor. Dr.parzan always kept us informed during IVF process and often took time to personally call us to check on us .He also was very helpful after delivery .** ** *** **** ****** ***
THANK YOU for everything 🙂

I would like to thank Dr Parzan Mistry from the bottom of my heart.

His calm demeanor provided me with a lot of comfort during my pregnancy.

He was always available and very accommodating, be it a last minute appointment in his clinic or responding to a whatsapp message very late at night.

Being pregnant in a foreign country is challenging, but Dr Mistry was very professional and provided assurance and comfort. 

Thanks to Dr Parzan Mistry and his team, my delivery was very smooth and we welcomed a healthy baby.

I would recommend and suggest him to family and friends and will continue to visit him for my regular medical checkups.

review: After numerous unsuccessful attempts to conceive due to PCOS, I had lost hope of becoming a mother. I had even started the process of registering for adoption. I had seen several doctors, but none had given me any real hope until I met Dr Parzan. His personalised and holistic treatment gave me the chance to become pregnant. Dr Parzan's care and expertise were invaluable, and I am greatful to him for giving me the gift of motherhood.

I really thank doctor parzan for understanding my condition and putting to me ease . I would recommend dr parzan for Endometriosis condition

He has knowledge which makes patient confident in taking important decisions. He has lots of patients and also he gave lots of time in each consultation.
Can’t thank Dr. Parzan.

Dr. Parzan Mistry is very great doctor! He takes time and listen to our problems. After many year of trying different medication courses, I found Dr. Parzan Mistry who help me in my issue and provided me with proper guidance and medications courses. Now I'm completely fine. **** *******

Dr. Parzan Mistry is absolutely patient friendly doctor. 100% recommended  for Gynaecology / Infertility / Obstetrics queries. He is available for patient at any given time 24/7. We are a happy family of 3  all thanks to Dr. Parzan for the constant support and good care of my wife throughout her pregnancy, delivery of our child and post delivery.

I consulted Dr Parzan for PCOS and really impressed by the way he explained my condition and planned my treatment . Only a month in his treatment and,I am experiencing positive results. Highly recommended doctor for any gynaecology related conditions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Parzan Mistry is the most genuine, ******* *** understanding doctor. He is very practical and accommodative to the patient’s requirements. Being over 35 years, both my husband and I, were not at all expecting to conceive at the very first attempt but Dr. Mistry made it happen. Moreover, he is always available to clarify any doubts and queries even beyond the regular working hours- which is very crucial at a delicate time like this. Further, he is very reasonable and affordable and will not make you spend unnecessarily.

Highly recommend!!!

We highly obliged to dr parzan as we were trying to conceive for past 10 years and were unable to do so due to a condition called endometriosis. Dr parzan helped us out though our ivf cycle and also in laparoscopy surgery for endometriosis . During the course of pregnancy ,it was a high risk as the blood pressure of my wife was high he was constantly supportive throughout our treatment and and also assured that he will continue the pregnancy till 9 months and now we are blessed with our baby boy. Thank you dr parzan for all your support and help

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited this dr parzan mistry for mu iui treatment 

He did my iui treatment ******* ******** ******* ** *** *** ***** ******** ** ********* **** * **** *** *** ****** **** *** ** **** parzan mistry and nishita shah stopped picking up my calls also i was charged 12k plus 10 k for other medical tests and i ended up wasting so much money 

**** *** **** ******* ***** ***** ***** **** ** ** *** ****** *** ***** ** ***
reply_text:
I suppose this is someone trying to tarnish the image of the doctors feigning a patient .
For iui the confirmation of rupture is not required .
The success of iui maximum is 18-20% so you can’t expect prompt results 
All patients calls are responded and there hasn’t been a single complaint till date regarding not answering calls from our end .
And if you have come via dr Nishita , you have just used our laboratory facilities for semen sample processing and not even had a consultation with our team of doctors. 
So please do your research first before posting negative comments.
